name: markymark
description: Stopwatch based on performance.mark() and measure()

scripts.clean: rimraf lib dist && mkdirp lib dist
scripts.rollup: rollup -c config/rollup.config.iife.js && rollup -c config/rollup.config.cjs.js && rollup -c config/rollup.config.es.js && rollup -c config/rollup.config.browser.cjs.js && rollup -c config/rollup.config.browser.es.js
